verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:17
verses.text: Therefore if any man be in Christ, he is a new creature: old things are passed away; behold, all things are become new.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:18
verses.text: And all things are of God, who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ, and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:19
verses.text: To wit, that God was in Christ, reconciling the world unto himself, not imputing their trespasses unto them; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 5:20
verses.text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ, as though God did beseech you by us: we pray you in Christ’s stead, be ye reconciled to God.
